summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a plan related to an individual named Jamie. Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of J.P. Morgan's Investment Bank. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the addressee only.
